channel.title: CVE Feed for Rapid7 -- Velociraptor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rapid7 -- Velociraptor

item.title: CVE-2022-35629|2024-09-16T20:26:44.573Z -- rapid7 -- velociraptor
item.description: Due to a bug in the handling of the communication between the client and server, it was possible for one client, already registered with their own client ID, to send messages to the server claiming to come from another client ID. This issue was resolved in Velociraptor 0.6.5-2.
